thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 43 of 3060
thread.title: Stephen Mannion

author: Stephen Mannion
title: Stephen Mannion
text: I thought that the service was very good. The only problem was when I was trying to book on line I could not use the Goldcar home site as it kept locking out. Instead I had to go through a price comparison site to reach Goldcar - even though it was always going to be my preferred choice - as tre rates are reasonable and the staff always helpful.
